jd: Job Description -JOB TITLE: Support Services, Project ManagerLocation: Baton Rouge, LA(Onsite) Only LocalsDuration: 6 months Visa: USC/GC/GC-EAD/H4-EADMOI: SkypeLinkedIn, DL, and Visa is MustMUST HAVE:· Overall IT experience: Required. 8-10 + yrs.· Education: Bachelor’s degree. Highly desired.· Provide day-to-day project management support. Required.· Activity and resource planning. Required. · Creation of project documentation: daily, weekly, semi-monthly and monthly status reports; project schedules and plans. Required.· Analyzing project risks and issues, help identify ways to mitigate risks. Required. · Process monitoring. Required. · Monitor project deliverables. Required. · Provide day-to-day support for on-going processes. Required. · Provide on-going evaluation and improvements for processes; work in needed areas to provide support services for agency’s workload demands. Required. · Documentation of specifications and requirements tracking; Conduct cost/benefit analysis. Required.
